name: ISDM Memory Chatbot
description: This project can be used as a starting point for building a Chat experience with user specific memory. You can set a different Session ID to start a new message history. (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

code.value:
from typing import Optional, Union

from axiestudio.base.io.chat import ChatComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import Text
from axiestudio.schema import Record


class ChatInput(ChatComponent):
    display_name = "Chat Input"
    description = "Get chat inputs from the Playground."
    icon = "ChatInput"

    def build_config(self):
        build_config = super().build_config()
        build_config["input_value"] = {
            "input_types": [],
            "display_name": "Message",
            "multiline": True,
        }

        return build_config

    def build(
        self,
        sender: Optional[str] = "User",
        sender_name: Optional[str] = "User",
        input_value: Optional[str] = None,
        session_id: Optional[str] = None,
        return_record: Optional[bool] = False,
    ) -> Union[Text, Record]:
        return super().build_no_record(
            sender=sender,
            sender_name=sender_name,
            input_value=input_value,
            session_id=session_id,
            return_record=return_record,
        )
code.name: code

return_record.name: return_record
return_record.info: Return the message as a record containing the sender, sender_name, and session_id.

session_id.name: session_id
session_id.info: If provided, the message will be stored in the memory.

node.description: Get chat inputs from the Playground.

from typing import Optional, Union

from axiestudio.base.io.chat import ChatComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import Text
from axiestudio.schema import Record


class ChatOutput(ChatComponent):
    display_name = "Chat Output"
    description = "Display a chat message in the Playground."
    icon = "ChatOutput"

    def build(
        self,
        sender: Optional[str] = "Machine",
        sender_name: Optional[str] = "AI",
        input_value: Optional[str] = None,
        session_id: Optional[str] = None,
        return_record: Optional[bool] = False,
        record_template: Optional[str] = "{text}",
    ) -> Union[Text, Record]:
        return super().build_with_record(
            sender=sender,
            sender_name=sender_name,
            input_value=input_value,
            session_id=session_id,
            return_record=return_record,
            record_template=record_template or "",
        )
code.name: code

return_record.name: return_record
return_record.info: Return the message as a record containing the sender, sender_name, and session_id.

session_id.name: session_id
session_id.info: If provided, the message will be stored in the memory.

code.name: code

record_template.name: record_template
record_template.info: Template to convert Record to Text. If left empty, it will be dynamically set to the Record's text key.

session_id.name: session_id
session_id.info: Session ID of the chat history.

code.value:
from typing import Optional

from langchain_openai import ChatOpenAI
from pydantic.v1 import SecretStr

from axiestudio.base.constants import STREAM_INFO_TEXT
from axiestudio.base.models.model import LCModelComponent
# from axiestudio.base.models.openai_constants import MODEL_NAMES
from axiestudio.field_typing import NestedDict, Text


class OpenAIModelCustomComponent(LCModelComponent):
    display_name = "OpenAI ISDM"
    description = "Generates text using OpenAI LLMs."
    icon = "OpenAI"

    field_order = [
        "max_tokens",
        "model_kwargs",
        "model_name",
        "openai_api_base",
        "openai_api_key",
        "temperature",
        "input_value",
        "system_message",
        "stream",
    ]

    def build_config(self):
        ISDM_MODEL_NAMES = ["mixtral:8x7b-instruct-v0.1-q5_0"]
        return {
            "input_value": {"display_name": "Input"},
            "max_tokens": {
                "display_name": "Max Tokens",
                "advanced": True,
                "info": "The maximum number of tokens to generate. Set to 0 for unlimited tokens.",
            },
            "model_kwargs": {
                "display_name": "Model Kwargs",
                "advanced": True,
            },
            "model_name": {
                "display_name": "Model Name",
                "advanced": False,
                "options": ISDM_MODEL_NAMES,
                "value": "mixtral:8x7b-instruct-v0.1-q5_0"
            },
            "openai_api_base": {
                "display_name": "OpenAI API Base",
                "advanced": True,
                "info": (
                    "The base URL of the OpenAI API. Defaults to https://api.openai.com/v1.\n\n"
                    "You can change this to use other APIs like JinaChat, LocalAI and Prem."
                ),
            },
            "openai_api_key": {
                "display_name": "OpenAI API Key",
                "info": "The OpenAI API Key to use for the OpenAI model.",
                "advanced": False,
                "password": True,
                "value": "sk-efffbcd0c2b346dd945b426b29201b9c"
            },
            "temperature": {
                "display_name": "Temperature",
                "advanced": False,
                "value": 0.1,
            },
            "stream": {
                "display_name": "Stream",
                "info": STREAM_INFO_TEXT,
                "advanced": True,
            },
            "system_message": {
                "display_name": "System Message",
                "info": "System message to pass to the model.",
                "advanced": True,
            },
        }

    def build(
        self,
        input_value: Text,
        openai_api_key: str,
        temperature: Optional[float] = 0.1,
        model_name: str = "mixtral:8x7b-instruct-v0.1-q5_0",
        max_tokens: Optional[int] = 8192,
        model_kwargs: NestedDict = {},
        openai_api_base: Optional[str] = None,
        stream: bool = True,
        system_message: Optional[str] = None,
    ) -> Text:
        if not openai_api_base:
            openai_api_base = "https://chat.crocc.meso.umontpellier.fr/ollama/v1"
        if openai_api_key:
            api_key = SecretStr(openai_api_key)
        else:
            api_key = None

        output = ChatOpenAI(
            max_tokens=max_tokens or None,
            model_kwargs=model_kwargs,
            model=model_name,
            base_url=openai_api_base,
            api_key=api_key,
            temperature=temperature,
        )

        return self.get_chat_result(output, stream, input_value, system_message)
code.name: code

max_tokens.name: max_tokens
max_tokens.info: The maximum number of tokens to generate. Set to 0 for unlimited tokens.

openai_api_base.name: openai_api_base
openai_api_base.info:
The base URL of the OpenAI API. Defaults to https://api.openai.com/v1.

You can change this to use other APIs like JinaChat, LocalAI and Prem.

openai_api_key.name: openai_api_key
openai_api_key.info: The OpenAI API Key to use for the OpenAI model.

stream.name: stream
stream.info: Stream the response from the model. Streaming works only in Chat.

system_message.name: system_message
system_message.info: System message to pass to the model.

    display_name = "Chat Input"

        build_config["input_value"] = {

        sender_name: Optional[str] = "User",

        session_id: Optional[str] = None,

        return super().build_no_record(
            sender=sender,
            sender_name=sender_name,
            input_value=input_value,
            session_id=session_id,
            return_record=return_record,
